term_description: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this study
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: Official name of the study or project. Project title should be fewer than 30 words, such as a title of a grant proposal or a publication.
term_example: Study of single cells in the human body
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The workflow or protocol followed during the study.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this study
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A 16-digit number that uniquely identify researchers.
term_error_message: Value must follow the format XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: A first name (or given name) is the personal name given to an individual conducting the study.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: A last name (or surname) is the family name passed down from one generation to the next for the individual conducting the study.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: A unique identifier used to send and receive electronic messages (emails) over the internet.
term_error_message: No consecutive dots or hyphens, must contain '@'.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: An organisation or institution that this person is associated with.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: A grant that directly or indirectly provides funding or sponsorship for the person to conduct the study.

term_description: Report the host's taxonomic name and/or NCBI taxonomy ID
term_error_message: String must start with uppercase and contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: The full scientific name of the species studied.
term_error_message: String must start with uppercase and contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: An identifier of the strain of the organism, if applicable.
term_error_message: Value should match the format - either a two-part string with a language code and identifier in square brackets, or a positive integer.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The type of tissue sampled for the study.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: Report the major environmental system the sample or specimen came from. The system(s) identified should have a coarse spatial grain, to provide the general environmental context of where the sampling was done (e.g. in the desert or a rainforest). Reference: https://github.com/EnvironmentOntology/envo/wiki/Using-ENVO-with-MIxS.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: Report the environmental material(s) immediately surrounding the sample or specimen at the time of sampling.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: Report the environmental material(s) immediately surrounding the sample or specimen at the time of sampling.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: A plant variety that has been selectively bred and maintained through cultivation to have specific desirable traits, such as yield, resistance to disease, or appearance.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The code used to identify the biological germplasm, strain, cell line or other source material. Useful for reordering material.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by the country or sea name followed by specific region name. Country or sea names should be chosen from the INSDC country list (http://insdc.org/country.html), or the GAZ ontology (http://purl.bioontology.org/ontology/GAZ)
term_error_message: Expected format: label1: value1, label2: value2.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The platform used to isolate the cells.

term_description: The instrument used to isolate the cells.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: The type of probes used to detect and quantify specific RNA molecules in their native spatial context within a tissue or cell.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The thickness of the tissue section in micrometres.
term_error_message: Input must be a valid number.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The method used to measure tissue section thickness.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The temperature at which the section was made in degree celsius.
term_error_message: Enter a valid number (positive or negative).
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: A quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's being abnormal and having a destructive effect on living tissue.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The duration of photobleaching in hours
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The duration of clearing at 47°C with Proteinase K.
term_error_message: Format: Number followed by time unit (e.g., '2 hrs', '5 days').
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The duration of tissue clearing at 37°C without Proteinase K.
term_error_message: Format: Number followed by time unit (e.g., '2 hrs', '5 days').
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The user guide for the instrument used.

technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The revision of the instrument user guide.
term_error_message: Input must be a valid number.

term_description: The guide used for sample preparation.

term_description: Any deviations from the official protocol. Separate individual deviations with '|'.
